snippet.title: TFC: The Fertile Crescent 1.0 Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Supported by the Queensland Government through Screen Queensland’s Games Grant, we are thrilled to announce that the highly anticipated 1.0 version of TFC: The Fertile Crescent will be launching on 13.06.24!

The announcement tells the story of the culmination of our seven-year journey, leading to the completion of our dream RTS game and its upcoming 1.0 release.

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1674820/TFC_The_Fertile_Crescent/

Join Our Community:
- Discord: https://discord.com/invite/9nGpUe2
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/TFC_game_rts
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/search/top/?q=tfc%20the%20fertile%20crescent

Thanks to @Andyax for making this trailer!

#rts #indiegame #realtimestrategygames #madewithunity #thefertilecrescent #strategy #pixelart
